project.description: An orchestration layer for AI coding assistants (currently Claude Code) that enforces consistency, reliability, and predictable outputs through domain-specific skill bundles, automated workflow management, and standards enforcement for CUI Open Source projects.
project.description_reasoning: From README.adoc introduction and bundle descriptions

default.responsibility: Root module coordinating 8 marketplace bundles with 95+ components (skills, agents, commands) that provide development standards, automation tools, and AI-assisted workflows for CUI Open Source projects.
default.responsibility_reasoning: From README.adoc introduction and marketplace.json structure
default.purpose_reasoning: Root module with marketplace.json descriptor, contains no direct functionality, coordinates child bundles

marketplace/bundles.description: Contains all 8 production bundles (plan-marshall, pm-workflow, pm-dev-java, pm-dev-frontend, pm-documents, pm-plugin-development, pm-requirements, pm-dev-java-cui, pm-dev-python) that form the marketplace component ecosystem

test.description: Python pytest test suites organized by bundle name, validating automation scripts across all marketplace bundles

default.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Root module with marshall-plugin build system, uses plugin-dev domain. Documentation profile added for doc/ directory.

documentation.responsibility: Project-level documentation including build structure, architecture decisions, and user-facing guides in AsciiDoc format.

doc.description: Project-level AsciiDoc documentation including build structure and architecture documentation

documentation.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Pure documentation module, only documentation profile applicable

plan-marshall.responsibility: Core infrastructure providing environment setup, permission management, extension API for domain bundle discovery, script execution, configuration management (marshal.json, run-configuration.json), and cross-cutting utilities including logging, memory persistence, and CI integration.
plan-marshall.responsibility_reasoning: From README.md overview and component inventory (18 skills, 1 agent, 2 commands)
plan-marshall.purpose_reasoning: Foundational bundle other bundles depend on, provides shared infrastructure

skill:extension-api.description: Domain bundle discovery framework with ExtensionBase abstract class, module detection from build files, and canonical command vocabulary for build system abstraction

skill:tools-script-executor.description: Generates the .plan/execute-script.py executor with embedded script mappings, enabling notation-based script invocation (bundle:skill:script) across all marketplace bundles

skill:manage-plan-marshall-config.description: CRUD operations for marshal.json project configuration including skill domain management, task executor configuration, and plan defaults

skill:marshall-steward.description: Project configuration wizard providing first-run setup (gitignore, executor, architecture discovery, marshal.json init, skill domains) and returning user maintenance menu

plan-marshall.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Core infrastructure bundle using plugin-dev domain for skill/agent/command components and Python scripts

pm-dev-frontend.responsibility: Frontend development standards and automation for CUI projects covering modern JavaScript (ES modules, async), CSS, Jest unit testing, Cypress E2E testing, JSDoc documentation, ESLint/Prettier/StyleLint configuration, project structure with Maven integration, and npm/npx build execution with output parsing.
pm-dev-frontend.responsibility_reasoning: From README.md purpose and 9 skills inventory
pm-dev-frontend.purpose_reasoning: Domain knowledge bundle providing frontend standards and 7 goal-based commands

skill:cui-javascript.description: Core JavaScript development standards covering ES modules, modern patterns, async programming, code quality, and CUI-specific best practices

skill:builder-npm-rules.description: npm/npx build execution with atomic build logging, workspace targeting for monorepos, automatic npm vs npx detection, and structured output parsing

skill:cui-javascript-linting.description: ESLint flat config, Prettier, and StyleLint configuration standards with build integration and rule management for CUI projects

pm-dev-frontend.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Frontend domain bundle using plugin-dev domain for skill/command development and Python scripts

pm-dev-java.responsibility: Comprehensive Java development expertise with agent-first architecture providing 9 autonomous agents for code implementation, testing, refactoring, and analysis. Contains 9 skills covering core Java patterns, null safety (JSpecify), Lombok, CDI/Quarkus, JUnit 5 testing, integration testing, JavaDoc, and maintenance prioritization.
pm-dev-java.responsibility_reasoning: From README.md purpose and component inventory
pm-dev-java.purpose_reasoning: Domain knowledge bundle, no executable runtime, provides standards and agents for Java projects

skill:java-core.description: Core Java development patterns covering modern features, coding standards, performance patterns, and general best practices for CUI projects

skill:junit-core.description: JUnit 5 testing patterns with AAA structure, assertion best practices, coverage standards (80% threshold), and test organization conventions

skill:java-cdi.description: Core CDI patterns including constructor injection, scope management (@ApplicationScoped, @RequestScoped), producers, and container configuration for Quarkus

skill:java-null-safety.description: JSpecify null safety annotations (@NullMarked, @Nullable) with package-level configuration and compile-time null-safety contracts

pm-dev-java.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Java domain bundle using plugin-dev domain for skill/agent/command development and Python automation scripts

pm-dev-java-cui.responsibility: CUI-specific Java development standards extending pm-dev-java with opinionated patterns for CUI Open Source libraries: CuiLogger/LogRecord structured logging, test data generation via Generators, value object contract testing (ShouldHandleObjectContracts), and HTTP client patterns (HttpHandler, HttpResult).
pm-dev-java-cui.responsibility_reasoning: From README.md overview and skill descriptions
pm-dev-java-cui.purpose_reasoning: Companion bundle to pm-dev-java, provides CUI library-specific patterns

skill:cui-logging.description: CuiLogger and LogRecord structured logging standards with DSL-style LogMessages classes and severity-based identifier organization

skill:cui-testing.description: CUI test library standards for mandatory Generators-based test data generation, value object contract testing (ShouldHandleObjectContracts), and JUL log verification

skill:cui-http.description: CUI HTTP client patterns with HttpHandler builder, HttpResult sealed interface, ETagAwareHttpAdapter for caching, and ResilientHttpAdapter for retry logic

pm-dev-java-cui.key_dependencies_reasoning: pm-dev-java-cui is a companion bundle extending pm-dev-java with CUI-specific patterns
pm-dev-java-cui.skills_by_profile_reasoning: CUI Java domain bundle using plugin-dev domain for skill components

pm-dev-python.responsibility: Python domain extension providing development standards and build infrastructure integration via pyprojectx (./pw wrapper), with runtime discovery of build commands from pyproject.toml aliases. Integrates ruff, mypy, and pytest for quality enforcement.
pm-dev-python.responsibility_reasoning: From README.md purpose and build command table
pm-dev-python.purpose_reasoning: Domain extension bundle for Python build operations

skill:cui-python.description: Core Python development patterns and standards for CUI projects

skill:plan-marshall-plugin.description: Python build infrastructure integration via pyprojectx wrapper with runtime discovery of build commands from pyproject.toml aliases

pm-dev-python.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Python domain bundle using plugin-dev domain for extension and build integration components

pm-documents.responsibility: Documentation lifecycle management for CUI projects with 3 goal-based commands (create, doctor, maintain) and 3 skills providing AsciiDoc standards enforcement, Architectural Decision Record (ADR) management, and interface specification management with 19 total workflows.
pm-documents.responsibility_reasoning: From README.md purpose and component inventory
pm-documents.purpose_reasoning: Domain bundle for documentation standards with templates, validation, and maintenance workflows

skill:ref-documentation.description: Core documentation standards skill with 9 workflows for format validation, link verification, content review, template-based creation, code synchronization, and metadata management

skill:manage-adr.description: Architectural Decision Record management with 5 CRUD workflows, automatic numbering, and AsciiDoc template-based creation

pm-documents.key_dependencies_reasoning: pm-documents optionally depends on plan-marshall for script execution and commit workflows
pm-documents.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Documentation domain bundle using plugin-dev domain for skill/command components and Python scripts

pm-plugin-development.responsibility: Complete toolchain for Claude Code marketplace component lifecycle: creation wizards, quality diagnosis with auto-fix, component maintenance, and marketplace verification. Provides architecture guidance for goal-based commands, skills-first development, and thin orchestrator patterns.
pm-plugin-development.responsibility_reasoning: From README.md purpose and goal-based architecture (CREATE, DOCTOR, MAINTAIN, VERIFY)
pm-plugin-development.purpose_reasoning: Self-contained plugin development toolkit with no inter-bundle dependencies

skill:plugin-architecture.description: Architecture principles and design guidance for goal-based commands, skills-first development, thin orchestrator patterns, and progressive disclosure in marketplace components

skill:plugin-create.description: Interactive creation wizard for marketplace components (agents, commands, skills, bundles) with duplication detection and validation

skill:plugin-doctor.description: Unified diagnose, auto-fix, prompt risky, and verify workflow for marketplace component quality assurance

pm-plugin-development.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Self-referential: plugin development bundle uses its own domain skills

pm-requirements.responsibility: Requirements engineering standards for CUI projects covering the complete documentation lifecycle: SMART requirements authoring, specification development with traceability, planning documents with task tracking, and bidirectional linking between requirements, specifications, implementation code, and tests.
pm-requirements.responsibility_reasoning: From README.md overview and lifecycle stages
pm-requirements.purpose_reasoning: Standards bundle for requirements documentation with 4 skills and 1 command

skill:requirements-authoring.description: SMART requirements authoring standards with proper structure, requirement numbering, ID schemes, and specification traceability

skill:traceability.description: Bidirectional traceability standards linking requirements to specifications, implementation code, and test implementations

pm-requirements.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Requirements domain bundle using plugin-dev domain for skill/command components

pm-workflow.responsibility: 7-phase development workflow engine (init, refine, outline, plan, execute, verify, finalize) using thin agents and domain-agnostic workflow skills. Manages plan lifecycle from high-level requests through solution outlining, task decomposition, execution with two-tier skill loading, quality verification, and git/PR finalization.
pm-workflow.responsibility_reasoning: From README.md architecture section and 7-phase execution model
pm-workflow.purpose_reasoning: Core runtime engine with 6 agents and 24 skills that orchestrate the planning workflow

skill:phase-3-outline.description: Solution outline creation using two-track approach (simple for localized changes, complex for codebase-wide discovery) producing deliverables with skill assignments

skill:phase-5-execute.description: Task execution coordinator using two-tier skill loading: system workflow skill plus domain-specific skills from task.skills array for profile-based execution

skill:workflow-extension-api.description: Extension points enabling domain-specific workflow customization through outline extensions and triage extensions loaded during plan execution

skill:manage-tasks.description: CRUD operations for TASK-*.toon files with sequential sub-step management, skill assignment, and status tracking throughout plan execution

pm-workflow.key_dependencies_reasoning: pm-workflow depends on plan-marshall for script execution, file operations, and domain skill configuration
pm-workflow.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Workflow engine bundle using plugin-dev domain for phase skills, agents, and Python scripts
